html:
1

Best Viral Mask

Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask

Pros
  • Provides noticeable results
Cons
  • Shape may not fit everyone perfectly

TikTok has fallen in love with this collagen mask, and it’s not hard to see why. The ultra-hydrating product is designed to be used as you sleep to “let the [ingredients] penetrate your skin over time. This is a great affordable option to increase your collagen intake,” explains Dr. Westbay.

Key ingredients: Collagen, probiotics

Size: 16 masks

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I absolutely love face masks and have tried a generous amount of them. But, this was the first overnight sheet mask I’ve ever used, and now I’m hooked. The mask had a soothing cooling sensation as I applied it, and was actually comfortable to sleep in. When I removed it in the morning, my skin felt so soft and smooth that I was visibly shocked at the results. These masks are now a staple in my beauty routine.” —Tasha Smith, ELLE beauty assistant

2

Best Rubber Mask

Dr. Jart+ Cryo Rubber Face Mask With Firming Collagen

Cons
  • May not be suitable for very sensitive skin

“This is a two-step mask meant to plump the skin and reduce the look of dryness. This make will also assist with getting rid of fine lines and wrinkles,” says Dr. Westbay. The ampoule contains plumping collagen, hydrating glycerin, and brightening niacinamide, while the rubber mask helps to lock everything in and cool your face down.

Key ingredients: Collagen, glycerin, niacinamide

Size: 1 mask

Sephora rating: 4.3/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “This rubber mask was a big hit when I brought it on a trip with friends. The two steps will make you feel like you’re doing a fun science experiment, and the result is a Vanilla Sky-like moisturizing mask. Unlike sheet masks, which can make your skin look and feel wet, this gives you more of a slight matte glow, but still with a strong moisturizing feeling. It’s good for people who describe sheet masks as ‘slimy.’” —Kathleen Hou, ELLE beauty director

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

3

Best Gel Mask

Mediheal Hyper Collagen Mask

Pros
  • Comes with enough serum to also apply décolletage and hands
Cons
  • Mask may be too short for some faces

Gel masks have become the It girls of the sheet mask world. Because of their texture, they’re ultra-cooling and adhere like a second skin, preventing them from sliding around like fabric sheet masks. This new one by Mediheal comes in two parts for easy application and infuses the skin with collagen for plumping, shea butter for moisture, and glutathione for its brightening effects.

Key ingredients: Collagen, shea butter, glutathione

Size: 4 masks

Amazon rating: 4.2/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “The collagen mask was easy to use and quick to apply to my face. I think the mask did a pretty good job at hydrating my skin and tightening my pores. After following the instructions and leaving it on for 30 minutes, I feel like my skin felt a lot firmer.”

4

Best for Mature Skin

Peach & Lily Glass Skin Ginseng Collagen Mask

Pros
  • Soothing formula
  • Can be kept on for hours

It’s kind of Peach & Lily’s thing to give us shortcuts to glass skin, and the brand does it exceptionally well. The Glass Skin Ginseng Collagen Mask, in particular, is a gem, with its 55,000 PPM of vegan collagen and a dose of antioxidant-rich ginseng extract, which brightens the skin and prevents signs of aging from appearing in the first place. When you’re prepping for big events, this mask is a must.

Key ingredients: Collagen, peptides, ginseng extract, niacinamide, lipids, cica, hyaluronic acid

Size: 1 mask

Peach & Lily rating: 4.8/5 stars

A Peach & Lily reviewer says: “I love this mask. I slept with it on like some reviewers recommended, and I felt the added benefit. The next day, I had lunch with my father, and he complimented me on my complexion, which he has never done before. I’m so pleased with this product that I will always have one in the house, and I definitely recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

5

Best for Enlarged Pores

Mario Badescu Super Collagen Mask

Pros
  • Eliminates excess sebum
Cons
  • Some may dislike jar packaging

Although most clay masks are not suitable for dry skin, this one actually “combats dryness and aging skin,” Akram reports. The formula brightens and plumps, and the infusion of oatmeal calms the skin.

Key ingredients: Collagen, oatmeal, red algae extract, kaolin clay

Size: 2 oz.

Amazon rating: 4.4/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “This mask is the only one that didn’t irritate my skin among all the products I have tried. After only one use, bumps on my cheek got so much better, and my dull skin and fine lines disappeared. I am so happy about the results, and I recommend this product to anyone.”

6

Most Luxurious

Knesko Gold Repair Collagen Multi Masking Kit

Pros
  • Contains a significant amount of serum
Cons
  • Does not include the same quantity of each mask

Gild yourself with this mask set and emerge with a blinding glow. The kit includes two face masks, two eye masks, a neck mask, a décolleté mask, and a lip mask, all of which are soaked in a serum chock-full of wrinkle-combatting ingredients, like collagen and hyaluronic acid.

Key ingredients: Collagen, hyaluronic acid, elastin

Size: 7 masks

Knesko rating: 4.3/5 stars

A Knesko reviewer says: “Recently had a friend come to visit, and we wanted to have a quiet evening of meditation, spa music, best friend time, and facials. I purchased these masks for face, neck, lips, eyes, and decolletage. When our relaxing time was up, we went to the magnifying mirror and unmasked. And for the first time, I had a gasp-worthy moment. As did my friend. We are both 54 years old and each had a glimpse of our 30-year-old selves—plumper, hydrated skin with a more even tone. Dark spots decreased and a far more glowing appearance.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

7

Best Korean Mask

Medicube Collagen Overnight Wrapping Mask

Pros
  • Peels off for easy cleanup
Cons
  • Must be applied generously for full effect

This overnight mask covers your face in a film that keeps moisture trapped within the skin for maximum product absorption. Famous for delivering “glass skin,” the formula features collagen, ceramides, and adenosine to firm, hydrate, and support the skin barrier.

Key ingredients: Collagen, ceramides, adenosine

Size: 2.53 fl. oz.

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I have damaged skin, and this mask has been incredibly soothing. The ceramide helps repair my skin, and the hydration from the glycerin is fantastic. My skin looks healthier and feels more resilient. It’s suitable for sensitive skin, which is a huge plus.”

8

Best Value

Dermal Collagen Essence Masks

Pros
  • Provides a refreshing feeliing
Cons
  • Some customers noted that the mask can dry out quickly

This pack contains enough products to keep you covered for nearly a month of daily masking. Each mask’s serum boasts collagen and vitamin E, along with a variety of other skin-loving ingredients, including green tea, cucumber, and ginseng.

Key ingredients: Collagen, vitamin E, panthenol

Size: 24 masks

Amazon rating: 4.6/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “High quality, strong fabric and amazing results. Every single one has been great. My skin looks amazing—I use about three a week on my face, neck, décolletage. Will be reordering these again!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

9

Best for All Skin Types

Rael Bamboo Face Sheet Mask

Cons
  • Shape of the mask may not fit everyone perfectly

Korean-founded brand Rael has created a collagen sheet mask that works for everyone concerned about fine lines and wrinkles—even those with sensitive skin. Because the serum features amino acids and hydrolyzed collagen, it’s a pro at restoring elasticity and volume in the face.

Key ingredients: Collagen, amino acids

Size: 5 masks

Amazon rating: 4.7/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I have tried every collagen-based face mask in the book, and Rael definitely delivers. I enjoyed [it] because of the generous amount of essence they provided. The serum used smelled pleasant and absorbed into the skin so well I felt like I was having a mini spa facial at home! After using a few masks, I noticed the hydrolyzed collagen drastically improved the sagginess in my skin. I love how they are so simple to use!”

10

Best Firming

Lapcos Collagen Sheet Mask

The Lapcos collagen sheet mask, powered by collagen and peptides, only takes about 10 minutes to give your skin a much-needed boost. After a quick self-care session involving this treatment, your skin will look smoother, plumper, and revitalized.

Key ingredients: Collagen, peptides

Size: 5 masks

Amazon rating: 4.5/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I have dry, aged skin from years of working and having fun outside and multiple military deployments to the Middle East. I’m also going through early menopause and am sensitive to just about anything I put on my face. It’s kind of a wreck. I washed my skin, toned with witch hazel, and put on a collagen mask for 20 minutes. No rinse afterwards. My skin was noticeably more plump, [it] softened my wrinkles, and [it] made my skin softer.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Meet the Experts

What is collagen?

According to Akram, collagen is “the primary building block in our bodies found in the middle layer of our skin (dermis).” She also explains that up to 30 percent of the protein in our bodies is collagen since it appears in other places, including our muscles, bones, and other organs.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Who can use collagen face masks?

Collagen face masks are best suited for those of us whose collagen production has slowed down. “Anyone with skin concerns related to aging, such as fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity, can use them. I would not recommend using collagen until you are an adult, as anyone younger has very sufficient collagen production,” says Dr. Westbay.

As a leading publisher of fashion, lifestyle, and beauty content, ELLE.com is committed to highlighting the best products in various categories by personally testing the latest and most innovative products, interviewing countless experts, and vetting customer-loved items. For this piece, Carol Lee consulted skin care experts to learn about the best collagen face masks. She also read through countless customer reviews and evaluated each product on their features.
